page.title: Users
page.description: Manage the users of your application

password.title: Update Password
password.description: Make sure your account is using a long, random password to stay secure

profile.title: Profile Information
profile.description: Update your name and email address

create.title: Create User
create.description: Fill in the details below to add a new user. Click add when you're done.

edit.title: Edit User
edit.description: Update the user here. Click save when you're done.

delete.title: Delete User
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete <strong1>{{email}}</strong1>? This action will permanently remove the user with the role of <strong2>{{role}}</strong2> from the system. This cannot be undone.

alert.title: Warning!
alert.description: Please be carefull, this operation can not be rolled back.

toast.title: The following user has been deleted:

impersonate.title: Impersonate User
impersonate.description: Are you sure you want to impersonate <strong1>{{email}}</strong1>? This action will allow you to act as this user (Role: <strong2>{{role}}</strong2>) in the system.

alert.title: Note
alert.description: You can revert to your original account at any time by logging out.

toast.title: You are now impersonating the following user:

invite.title: Invite User
invite.description: Invite new user to join your team by sending them an email invitation. Assign a role to define their access level.

description.label: Description (optional)
description.placeholder: Add a personal note to your invitation (optional)
